intro: Barleria her, commonly known as redstem barleria, is a flowering plant native to Africa and parts of Asia. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its erect, hairy stems and clusters of vibrant red or pink flowers. The plant typically grows in grasslands and disturbed soils, preferring full sun and well-drained soil. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a slightly hairy texture. Barleria her is often used in ornamental gardening due to its striking floral display and hardy nature.
